nodes.name: study_registration_metadata
nodes.description: Export of the dbGaP FHIR API study registration metadata which provides study-level metadata for a specific PHS ID.

properties.name: Accession
properties.description: The accession number of the dbGaP study, which is the phs number prefixed with 'phs' and including the version, consent group, and participant set numbers (e.g., phs004055.v1.p1.c1).

properties.name: c
properties.description: The c number denotes the consent group, which contains data from a set of participants who have all signed the same consent agreement. A study with multiple consent groups will have multiple consent group numbers (e.g., .c1, .c2). Data delivered for a single consent group will have the same Data Use Limitations (DULs).

properties.name: ConsentGroup
properties.description: Text code that indicates data use restrictions (e.g., GRU=general research, HMB=health/biomedical only, DS-X=disease-specific, NPU=non-profit use, IRB=requires ethics approval) per Data Use Ontology (DUO).

The p number, also known as the 'participant set version', identifies a specific group of participants within a study. The number is incremented when the consent status of subjects in an existing study set changes, but not when new subjects are simply added.
The phs ID of the dbGaP study; phs stands for Phenotype Study and indicates that the accession number is for a dbGaP study.
The v number is the study's version number. This number is incremented when changes are made to existing data or new data is added to a study.
The title of the dbGaP study.

properties.name: handle
properties.description: The human-readable ID or handle of the dbGaP study.

properties.name: Description
properties.description: The description of the dbGaP study.

nodes.name: telemetry_report
nodes.description: Export of the dbGaP FHIR API subject telemetry report, which provides subject-level metadata for a specific PHS ID.

properties.name: consent_code
properties.description: The consent code assigned to a subject.

properties.name: dbgap_subject_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for a subject in the context of a dbGaP study.

properties.name: submitted_subject_id
properties.description: The unique identifier for a subject that was originally submitted by the data contributor.

nodes.name: derive13
nodes.description: Data from version 1 of the main study of the Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) study within the BioLINCC repository.

properties.name: ID_C
properties.description: The unique identifier for subjects in the ARIC (Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities) study dataset within the BioLINCC repository. The submitted_subject_id in the subject telemetry report.

nodes.name: dmri_ia1
nodes.description: Data from an ancillary study Diffusion Magnetic Resonance Imaging-1 (dmri-ia1) of the Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities (ARIC) study within the BioLINCC repository.

properties.name: ID_C
properties.description: The unique identifier for subjects in the ARIC (Atherosclerosis Risk in Communities) study dataset within the BioLINCC repository. The submitted_subject_id in the subject telemetry report.
